stages.logText:
In a hut southwest from Fallhaven I met Alaun.
He asked me to bring him some of the delicious soup made by Gison with forest mushrooms.
Gison's house lies to the south.
I found Gison's house and should deliver the soup to Alaun while it is hot.
Gison gave me a new soup for 5 gold.
Gison gave me a new soup for 50 gold.
Gison gave me a new soup for 500 gold.
Gison gave me a new soup for 5000 gold. I should really go to Alaun now.

Alaun received the soup.
I shall take the empty bottle back to Gison.
I brought the empty bottle to Gison.

I spent 5555 gold on buying mushroom soup! Am I crazy? 
There is no soup left for Alaun now.
Gison, the man with the mushroom soup in the forest south of Fallhaven, got raided. Only his cookbook was stolen and he asked me to bring it back to him.
I agreed to help him.
Gison said the thieves came from the south. I should begin my search there.
I discovered a hidden cave. The thieves may be hiding there.
I found the thieves. One of them was performing some kind of ritual when I came into the cave.
I took the book from the leader's dead hands. After they noticed me, they wanted to see me dead.
I brought the cookbook back to Gison. The thieves made a second copy of the book without the strange writing, which Gison gladly accepted. Gison can now cook his mushroom soup again.
I told Gison that I found the thieves, but that they had destroyed the cookbook.
Gison will give me mushroom soup in thanks if I bring him 50 gold, 2 of Bogsten's mushrooms and an empty bottle.
